detail_desc: 3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
Jacket in soft faux fur with a round neckline, zip down the front and side pockets. Lined.

Straight skirt in sturdy cotton twill with a high paper bag waist and zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Wide, detachable tie belt, patch pockets with a folded edge at the top, and a slit at the front of the hem. Unlined.

Straight skirt in sturdy cotton twill with a high paper bag waist and zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Wide, detachable tie belt, patch pockets with a folded edge at the top, and a slit at the front of the hem. Unlined.
Cap in felted fabric containing some wool with an adjustable hook and loop tab at the back.
Cap in felted fabric containing some wool with an adjustable hook and loop tab at the back.

Two-piece dance costume with a glossy jersey body and a chiffon skirt. Body with a V-neck, gathers at the top, short sleeves and a lined gusset. Skirt with a glittery elastic waistband and a sewn-in wrapover at the front.

Two-piece dance costume with a glossy jersey body and a chiffon skirt. Body with a V-neck, gathers at the top, short sleeves and a lined gusset. Skirt with a glittery elastic waistband and a sewn-in wrapover at the front.
Cargo trousers in a stretch cotton weave with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs, Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets with a flap, and leg pockets with a pleat and flap.
Cargo trousers in a stretch cotton weave with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs, Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets with a flap, and leg pockets with a pleat and flap.
Cargo trousers in a stretch cotton weave with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs, Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets with a flap, and leg pockets with a pleat and flap.

Dungaree shorts in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort. Frill trims down the sides of the top, adjustable straps with a metal fastener, a seam at the waist and press-studs at the sides. Fake fly, side and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Slim-fit dungarees in stretch denim. Flounce-trimmed top, adjustable straps with metal fasteners, a press-stud at the sides and front and back pockets. The cotton content of the dungarees is partly recycled.
Short-sleeved Henley tops in soft cotton jersey with a button placket. Open chest pocket in woven fabric.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft cotton. T-shirt in jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and print motif on the front. Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft cotton. T-shirt in jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and print motif on the front. Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft cotton. T-shirt in jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and print motif on the front. Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft cotton. T-shirt in jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and print motif on the front. Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Set with a T-shirt in cotton jersey and pair of shorts in cotton sweatshirt fabric. Round-necked T-shirt with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and print motif on the front that continues onto the appliqué at one side. Shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, appliqué at one side and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Sleeveless romper suit in soft, patterned, organic cotton jersey with elastication at the top and narrow shoulder straps with sewn-on bows. Press-studs at the crotch and short legs with elastication and a narrow frill trim around the hems.

Sleeveless romper suit in soft, patterned, organic cotton jersey with elastication at the top and narrow shoulder straps with sewn-on bows. Press-studs at the crotch and short legs with elastication and a narrow frill trim around the hems.

Sleeveless romper suit in soft, patterned, organic cotton jersey with elastication at the top and narrow shoulder straps with sewn-on bows. Press-studs at the crotch and short legs with elastication and a narrow frill trim around the hems.

Sleeveless romper suit in soft, ribbed jersey with button-front shoulder straps, a small chest pocket and short legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. The cotton content of the romper suit is organic.
Long-sleeved top in sturdy jersey with a print motif on the front, round neckline, ribbing at the cuffs and short slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved top in sturdy jersey with a print motif on the front, round neckline, ribbing at the cuffs and short slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved top in sturdy jersey with a print motif on the front, round neckline, ribbing at the cuffs and short slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved top in sturdy jersey with a print motif on the front, round neckline, ribbing at the cuffs and short slits in the sides.
Jacket in a patterned crêpe weave with wide, pompom-trimmed 3/4-length sleeves and a pompom trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Narrow, satin-covered Alice band with fabric flowers on top.
Narrow, satin-covered Alice band with fabric flowers on top.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a bow on top.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a bow on top.

Sports jacket in sturdy jersey with a reflective print at the back of the neck. Mesh-lined hood with a decorative drawstring, and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Chest pocket with a concealed zip, side pockets, and narrow, elasticated trims in a contrasting colour at the cuffs and back of the hem. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the jacket is recycled.
Block-coloured sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waist panel for best fit over the tummy.

Ankle-length suit trousers in a jacquard weave with a slight sheen. High waist, zip fly and hook-and-eye fasteners. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight, slightly wider legs with creases.

Knee-length dress in jersey crêpe. V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover at the top and gathered seams at the shoulders and waist for a gentle draped effect. Gathered yoke at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a seam with narrow elastication at the waist.

Knee-length dress in jersey crêpe. V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover at the top and gathered seams at the shoulders and waist for a gentle draped effect. Gathered yoke at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a seam with narrow elastication at the waist.

Knee-length dress in jersey crêpe. V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover at the top and gathered seams at the shoulders and waist for a gentle draped effect. Gathered yoke at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a seam with narrow elastication at the waist.
Scarf in softly draping, patterned satin.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
